AI Description: Chopper is a tool designed for efficient removal of adapter sequences from high-throughput sequencing data. It helps in preprocessing raw sequencing reads by trimming adapter sequences to ensure high-quality downstream analysis.
Core Features: Adapter Sequence Removal, Preprocessing Of Raw Sequencing Data, Quality Control, High-Throughput Sequencing Support
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Ngs Data Analysis, Sequence Trimming, High-Throughput Sequencing
